Džentlmen Poketino: Nismo ovoliko bolji od Zvezde, uživao sam u Beogradu
“Velika pobeda, jer smo ispunili plan i dominirali“, poručio je Argentinac
07 Nov 2019 by Darjan Nedeljković
Došao, video i odneo ubedljivu pobedu. Tako ukratko može da se opiše misija Mauricija Poketina. Mnogo razloga za zadovoljstvo imao je sjajni stručnjak, jer je njegov tim ubedljivim trijumfom uspeo da podigne samopouzdanje. Ipak, Poketino je i pored velikih 9:0 u dve utakmice sa Crvenom zvezdom džentlemenski pohvalio srpskog šampiona kao i kompletan doživljaj u glavnom gradu Srbije.“Ovo je dobar meč u gostima. Hteli smo ovakvu utakmicu, verujem da će se to odraziti na naše samopouzdanje. Ovo je jedan mali korak, kao protiv Evertona. Moramo da pronađemo način da pobeđujemo u kontinutetu.Ovo je velika pobeda. Potpuno zasluženo. Sjajno smo počeli utakmicu, izvršili smo plan, sporovodili smo ideje. Nismo dali Zvezdi da poraste i proširi svoj uticaj. Pripremali smo se vrlo temeljno za ovaj meč. Znamo kako je Liverpul prošao. Plan je bio da igramo na protivničkoj polovini, da im oduzimamo loptu i pritiskamo. Oni nisu dali gol, ali je Zvezda dobar tim. Imaju dobrog trenera i stručni štab“, rekao je Poketino.
Argentinac je zatim prokomentarisao Zvezdinu igru, kao i atmosferu na stadionu. Posebno, što je deo ostrvskih medija imao strah.“Ovo nije pravi odraz kvaliteta. Dese se ovakve utakmice, kao nama protiv Bajerna, kada je rival iskoristio sve šanse. Uživao sam na stadionu Crvene zvezde. Navijači su bili  fantastični, ukazali su nam poštovanje. Sjajno gostoprimstvo smo imali ovde. Voleo bih da dođemo ponovo“.
Hjong-min Son je izrastao u junaka meča, iako je imao probleme psihičke prirode posle loma noge Andre Gomeša.“Imali smo problem, ne samo sa Sonom, nego sa celim timom. Žao nam je zbog svega što se desilo. Pomogli smo mu da to prevaziđe. On je znao da igramo za tri boda.  Ponašao se vrlo odgovorno. Želeo je da pomogne ekipi da osvoji važna tri boda“.
Upitan je i o igri Đovanija Lo Selsa.“Dobro je reagovao. Igrao je dobro i za nacionalnu selekciju. Zadovoljam sam, jer je on snažna ličnost i prava ličnost. Samo je u pitanju vreme. On i Seseonjon su došli u teškim okolnostima. Zadovoljan sam šta oni donose timu“.
(FOTO: Reuters)

Gentleman Poketino: We are not this much better than the Star, I enjoyed Belgrade
"Great victory, because we fulfilled the plan and dominated," said the Argentine
07 Nov 2019 by Darjan Nedeljkovic
He came, saw and took a convincing victory. That is how the mission of Mauritius Poketin can be briefly described. A great expert had many reasons to be pleased, as his team was able to raise confidence with a convincing triumph. However, despite the big 9-0 win in two games with the Red Star, Poketino praised the Serbian champion, as well as the complete experience in the Serbian capital. "This is a good away game. We wanted a match like this, I believe it will affect our confidence. This is one small step, as against Everton. We have to find a way to win the Continent. This is a big win. Well deserved. We started the game great, we executed the plan, we implemented the ideas. We have not given the Star to grow and expand its influence. We have been preparing very thoroughly for this match. We know how Liverpool went. The plan was to play on the opponent's half, take away the ball and put pressure on them. They didn't score, but Star is a good team. They have a good coach and professional staff, "said Poketino.
The Argentinean then commented on the Star game as well as the atmosphere in the stadium. Particularly, which was part of the island media's fear. " This is what happens to us, like us against Bayern, when the rival has taken every chance. I enjoyed the Red Star Stadium. The fans were fantastic, they showed us respect. We had great hospitality here. I wish we would come again. "
Hyong-min Son grew into a hero of the match, though he had psychic problems after breaking Andre Gomes's leg. "We had a problem, not only with Son, but with the whole team. Sorry about everything that happened. We helped him overcome it. He knew we were playing for three points. He acted very responsibly. He wanted to help the team score an important three points. "
He was also asked about Giovanni Lo Sels' play. "He responded well. He also played well for national selection. I am satisfied, because he is a strong personality and a real personality. It's just about the weather. He and Seseonjon came under difficult circumstances. I am pleased with what they bring to the team. "
(PHOTO: Reuters)
